original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Cappadocia Balloons
overview: The scenery in Central Anatolia provides an impression of untouched landscape with cleft canyons & mystic rock formations. The landmarks are its huge structures & strange tuff stone pillars. The chimneys are one of the famous sights in Turkey & are found in many of Cappadocia's valleys in which the bizarrely formed rock cones & steep walls highlight the magical character of the remote landscape.
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Cappadocia Balloons
